Name: Verify Airdrop Potential and Accumulation Insights
Description: Navigate to the Airdrops tab and access the Accumulation phase insights. Perform a search and verify the displayed information on the Biconomy coins page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://dropstab.com/
step 2: Click on link '\U0001fa82\nPotential Airdrop' -> Navigate to page 'tab/airdrops'
step 3: Click on link 'Accumulation' -> Navigate to page 'insights/accumulation-phase'
step 4: Click on button 'Search\n/'
step 5: Click on input field 'search' -> Navigate to page 'coins/biconomy'
step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Search Functionality on Nfprompt Coins Page
Description: Navigate to the Nfprompt coins page and perform a search. Verify the displayed information on the Nfprompt coins page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://dropstab.com/coins/nfprompt
step 2: Click on button 'Search\n/'
step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
